website_summaries.verdict: Great vintage looks combined with a large basin and surrounding surface area makes this a great choice for a traditional bathroom layout.
pros: Extra-large basin has plenty of space for washing objects, doing laundry, and other random uses
Easy to install fixtures with the extra wide spacing
cons: Requires extra components for the legs and supports

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sink!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sink! Extremely good quality and looks perfect with my 1938 bathroom. I love that there is room to put toothbrush cup and soap on sides of sink. Much better than your average wall mounted or pedestal sink. Our handyman said it was okay to install. The legs we purchased separately took some time, but sink was ok. You need to purchase a pedestal or console legs as well as a faucet/handle/drain combo.
customer_reviews.author: Cocoanut

customer_reviews.title: The sink as a whole was just fine, however
customer_reviews.text: The sink as a whole was just fine, however, it was suggested people who purchased this sink also purchased the American Standard 8719000.002 Edgemere Console Table Legs, Chrome, which as it turns out does not fit together. I had to send the sink back and run to the local hardware box store to get a sink that fit the stand I bought so that my contractor could put it in in a timely manner. Be sure that if you get this sink that it will fit whichever stand you select for it.
customer_reviews.author: Es

customer_reviews.title: Lovely sink - small adjustments required for installation
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this sink. It is beautiful and functional standing in front of a window. The only change we had to make was to modify the slot in the bottom of the pedestal to accommodate the standard sized drain line from the sink. The hole at the base, directly below the drain is too small for standard plumbing, leaving you the choice of either having an exposed drain pipe back into the wall, or behind the pedestal on the floor. This is probably 'standard' but I like to completely hide the plumbing fittings in my sink installations.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Knight

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sink with unique layout
customer_reviews.text: I have a 1911 home with a small bathroom. This sink was a good fit: it feels classic enough that it blends in. I chose theas the base. By installing this combination in my storage-starved bathroom, I got a big drawer in the base and some nice deck space on the sink. Now I can put something down near the sink! The design puts the widest part toward the wall and projects only part of the sink basin in to the room, which is a perfect compromise. Other sinks were too big for my space or too small for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Keystone

customer_reviews.title: Great sink!
customer_reviews.text: This sink looks great with the matching pedestal (sold separately) in our newly remodeled bathroom. Lots of room on the sides of the sink for storage, which was key for our small bathroom. Really beautiful and great price. My plumber did have some trouble installing it because it doesn't come with a mounting plate and you only have two small holes on either side to secure it. He said it was meant for new construction with that set up. Just be careful to not be too rough with it, as some of the porcelain broke off around one of the holes and we had to rig it up. But it's in and looks amazing, so we're happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay S.

customer_reviews.title: Great sink, but needs the console base.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sink. This sink can not be wall mounted per American Standard. I had to buy the base. Which took the cost from $150 to $654, that being said it was worth it. Installation is easy if you have some DIY experience. If not I would have a plumber do it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris04976

Not too deep, yet still allows for a nice sized bowl that is very usable. Highly recommended to buy both this and the legs (available separately).

customer_reviews.title: Help keep a really small bathroom clutter-free.

The design offers just enough "counter space" to temporarily house the contact lens case and solution and then one's' compelled (not just by the nagging partner) to clear it off. Works like a charm. Yet, speaking of charm, the vintage-inspired console designed to fit underneath it is very charming but ridiculously over-priced. I just couldn't do it.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy a sink online, that I had never seen before, but I was so happy when it arrived and looked beautiful in my small bathroom. I ordered the chrome matching legs as well and the measurements were exact on the description and there were no damaged parts. I absolutely love the look of this sink...the basin is large and there is plenty of room on the sides for soap, toothbrushes, etc., but it doesn't have the bulky look that some of the pedestal sinks do. The openness of the bottom makes my tiny bathroom appear larger, plus I love having the extra shelf for storage and the hand towel bar. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: birmingham mom

customer_reviews.title: REPLACEMENT

Made for a perfect Saturday afternoon DIY project...

Style:Console SinkThis item is a american standard 0282.008.020 retrospect pedestal console sink top with 8-inch faucet spacing, white . Purpose of use for plumbing fixtures, tub and shower faucets and accessories. This product is manufactured in china.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
American Standard Retrospect console table top with 8-Inch centers, white 0282.008.020. This sink is constructed of fireclay (a variation of vitreous china that has greater amounts of quartz and feldspar), which is heavier, denser and thicker than regular clay - qualities that insure smooth, flat surfaces not achievable with standard vitreous china. It has a hidden front overflow and is designed to match the Retrospect Collection toilets. The faucets are on 8-Inch centers. The bowl sizes are 15-1/2-Inch wide by 12-Inch front-to-back by 6-1/8-Inch deep. About American Standard brands - great performance and great looks meet in our complete line of fixtures and faucets for bath and kitchen. Performance and reliability. Coordinated collections.
